com.jjoe64.graphview.series

Class BarGraphSeries<E extends DataPointInterface>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jjoe64.graphview.series.BaseSeries<E>
      • com.jjoe64.graphview.series.BarGraphSeries<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Series<E>

    public class BarGraphSeries<E extends DataPointInterface>
extends BaseSeries<E>
    Series with Bars to visualize the data. The Bars are always vertical.

    • Field Summary

      • setValueDependentColor

        Parameters:
        mValueDependentColor - hook null to disable

      • getSpacing

        public int getSpacing()
        Returns:
        the spacing between the bars in percentage

      • setSpacing

        public void setSpacing(int mSpacing)
        Parameters:
        mSpacing - spacing between the bars in percentage. 0 => no spacing 100 => the space bewetten the bars is as big as the bars itself

      • isDrawValuesOnTop

        public boolean isDrawValuesOnTop()
        Returns:
        whether the values should be drawn above the bars

      • setDrawValuesOnTop

        public void setDrawValuesOnTop(boolean mDrawValuesOnTop)
        Parameters:
        mDrawValuesOnTop - flag whether the values should drawn above the bars as text
